name: Kraze
description:
Kraze is a racing-arcade game developed by 7Seas Technologies. It was originally released in 2009. Candella Software published the game.
Kraze is available on PC.
It was produced by Kazumi Kitaue. It was directed by Yoshitaka Murayama. It was scored by Hirofumi Taniguchi, Hiroshi Tamawari, Mayuko Kageshita and Miki Higashino.
